00061 
00062 void CSwordModuleSearch::percentUpdate(char percent, void *){
00063     cms_currentProgress = (int)percent;
00064     if (cms_module_count > 1)
00065       cms_overallProgress = (int)((float)((cms_module_current - 1)*100+cms_currentProgress))/cms_module_count;
00066     else
00067       cms_overallProgress = cms_currentProgress;
00068     m_updateSig.activate(); 
00069 }
00070 
00072 void CSwordModuleSearch::setModules( ListCSwordModuleInfo& list ) {
00073     m_moduleList = list;
00074 }
00075 
00077 const bool CSwordModuleSearch::startSearch() {
00078     backend()->setFilterOptions ( CBTConfig::getFilterOptionDefaults() );   
00079     m_foundItems            = false;
00080     m_terminateSearch = false;
00081     m_isSearching       = true;     
00082         
00083     cms_currentProgress = 0;
00084     cms_overallProgress = 0;
00085     cms_module_current = 0;
00086     cms_module_count = m_moduleList.count();
00087     
00088     bool foundItems = false;
00089     
00090     CSwordModuleInfo* m = 0;
00091     for (m_moduleList.first(); m_moduleList.current() && !m_terminateSearch; m_moduleList.next()) {
00092         cms_module_current++;
00093         if ( m_moduleList.current()->search(m_searchedText, m_searchOptions, m_searchScope, &percentUpdateDummy) )
00094             foundItems = true;
00095     }
00096     cms_currentProgress = 100;
00097     cms_overallProgress = 100;
00098     
00099     m_foundItems = foundItems;      
00100     m_isSearching = false;
00101     m_terminateSearch = false;
00102 
00103     m_finishedSig.activate();       
00104     return true;
00105 }

00135 void CSwordModuleSearch::setSearchScope( ListKey scope ) {

00140 void CSwordModuleSearch::resetSearchScope() {
00141     m_searchScope.ClearList();

00143 
00145 void CSwordModuleSearch::interruptSearch() {
00146     if (m_isSearching)
00147         m_terminateSearch = true; //no other modules will be searched
00148     for (m_moduleList.first(); m_moduleList.current(); m_moduleList.next())
00149         m_moduleList.current()->interruptSearch(); //interrupt the current module
00150 }

00163 const int CSwordModuleSearch::getPercent( percentType type ){
00164     int ret = 0;    
00165     switch (type) {
00166         case currentModule:
00167             return cms_currentProgress;
00168         case allModules:
00169             return cms_overallProgress;
00170 //      default:
00171 //          return 0;
00172     };
00173     return 0;
00174 }
